customer_name: Wild Friends Of The Earth Foundation
site_name: WILD FRIENDS OF THE EARTH FOUNDATION

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00PM on
30-Sep-19.
Arrived at facility at 12:00pm, No one appeared to be around. Called the site contact numbers, left voicemails, and
waited for 45 minutes. Licensee called later that afternoon and provided optimal days of the week for a future
inspection.
